title: Formula 1 2014-Malaysia Practice Session 3.720p.H264.AC3.TBK
description:
Race 2: Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia

PRACTICE SESSION 3

Full Coverage of the 3rd Practice Session from the Sepang Circuit, Kuala Lumpur, Broadcast Live via SKY SPORTS F1 HD

MAIN FILE DETAILS:

Air Date: 29.03.14
Circuit: Sepang, Kuala Lumpur
Resolution: 1280x720
Audio: AC3 5.1 Dolby Digital 
Video: H.264 Profile 4.0 High
Container: MKV
Running Time: 1:24.28
Broadcast Time: 03:45-04:30
Source: Encoded From VU+ Solo2 PVR
Broadcast: Sky Sports F1 HD (UK)
File Size: 2.58GB


I will be providing the entire F1 Season from Sky Sports F1 HD.. Please visit my blog below for full details of everything you need for the forthcoming F1 2014 Season including links to all torrents and fileshare downloads.

Formula 1 Blog: See .txt File

with encoding the audio feed as pure 6 channel AC3 Digital.

All my torrents for F1 2014 are wrapped into MKV format. Resolution is scaled to 720p with 6 channel AC3 Dolby Digital Audio. These video files will play very fluidly with the standard media players such as VLC, WMP, KM Player, WMC, MP-HC.


Screenshots are also provided for visual confirmation & quality, I do try to check carefully not to show any spoilers!


I welcome any comments or suggestions...


FOR ALL YOUR LATEST F1 NEWS, GOSSIP, TRACK GUIDES, DISCUSSION & FULL TORRENT & FILESHARE LINKS INFORMATION IN MORE DETAIL, AND ACCESS TO MUCH 

MORE, PLEASE KEEP YOUR EYE ON MY BLOG
